      public static Map<String,String> getHeaders(android.content.Context context)
      Generates the headers for API requests with authorization.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context used to retrieve user credentials.
      Returns:
      A map of headers including content type and authorization credentials.

    • uploadPdfToServer

      Uploads a PDF resume to the server for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      userId - ID of the student.
      pdfUri - Uri of the PDF file to upload.
      listener - Response listener for successful upload.
      errorListener - Error listener for handling errors.
